description.zh-cn: 唐朝公主、政治家和权臣，为唐高宗李治与武则天的小女儿。生平极受父母兄长尤其是其母武则天的宠爱，权倾一时，后因涉嫌谋反被侄子唐玄宗赐死。
description.en: A princess, politician, and powerful courtier of the Tang dynasty, the youngest daughter of Emperor Gaozong and Wu Zetian. Highly favored by her parents and brothers, especially her mother, she wielded immense power. She was later forced to commit suicide by her nephew Emperor Xuanzong on charges of treason.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第三位皇帝，太平公主的父亲。
description.en: The third emperor of the Tang dynasty, father of Princess Taiping.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上唯一得到普遍承认的（正统）女皇帝，太平公主的母亲。
description.en: The only universally recognized female emperor of China, mother of Princess Taiping.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第四位和第六位皇帝，太平公主的兄长。
description.en: The fourth and sixth emperor of the Tang dynasty, brother of Princess Taiping.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第五位和第九位皇帝，太平公主的兄长。
description.en: The fifth and ninth emperor of the Tang dynasty, brother of Princess Taiping.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第九位皇帝，唐睿宗李旦第三子，太平公主的侄子。
description.en: The ninth emperor of the Tang dynasty, third son of Emperor Ruizong (Li Dan), and nephew of Princess Taiping.

description.zh-cn: 太平公主的第一任丈夫，城阳公主之子。因受兄长薛𫖮谋反牵连，被武则天杖责饿死狱中。
description.en: Princess Taiping's first husband, son of Princess Chengyang. He was implicated in his brother Xue Yi's rebellion and was caned and starved to death in prison by order of Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 太平公主的第二任丈夫，武则天的堂侄。
description.en: Princess Taiping's second husband, a paternal cousin of Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 唐高宗与武则天的长女，太平公主的姐姐。
description.en: The eldest daughter of Emperor Gaozong and Wu Zetian, older sister of Princess Taiping.

description.zh-cn: 唐高宗李治第五子，武则天长子，太平公主的兄长。
description.en: The fifth son of Emperor Gaozong (Li Zhi) and the eldest son of Wu Zetian, older brother of Princess Taiping.

description.zh-cn: 唐高宗李治第六子，武则天次子，太平公主的兄长。
description.en: The sixth son of Emperor Gaozong (Li Zhi) and the second son of Wu Zetian, older brother of Princess Taiping.

description.zh-cn: 由唐玄宗李隆基发动的宫廷政变，旨在清除太平公主及其党羽的政治势力。
description.en: A court coup launched by Emperor Xuanzong (Li Longji) to eliminate the political power of Princess Taiping and her faction.

description.zh-cn: 李隆基与太平公主联手发动的宫廷政变，诛杀韦皇后及其党羽，拥立唐睿宗复位。
description.en: A court coup jointly launched by Li Longji and Princess Taiping, which resulted in the execution of Empress Wei and her faction and the restoration of Emperor Ruizong to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 唐中宗李显的第二任皇后。中宗死后临朝称制，后在唐隆政变中被李隆基和太平公主所杀。
description.en: The second empress consort of Emperor Zhongzong (Li Xian). After Zhongzong's death, she ruled as regent but was killed by Li Longji and Princess Taiping during the Tanglong Coup.

description.zh-cn: 太平公主与薛绍之子。
description.en: Son of Princess Taiping and Xue Shao.

description.zh-cn: 唐代女官、诗人、皇妃。武则天时期的重要政治人物，在唐隆政变中被李隆基所杀。
description.en: A female official, poet, and imperial consort during the Tang dynasty. A key political figure during Wu Zetian's reign, she was killed by Li Longji in the Tanglong Coup.

description.zh-cn: 张柬之等人发动的宫廷政变，推翻武则天，恢复唐朝，拥立唐中宗复位。
description.en: A court coup launched by Zhang Jianzhi and others, which overthrew Wu Zetian, restored the Tang dynasty, and put Emperor Zhongzong back on the throne.

description.zh-cn: 唐中宗李显之女，太平公主的侄女。恃宠而骄，干预朝政，与太平公主敌对。
description.en: Daughter of Emperor Zhongzong (Li Xian) and niece of Princess Taiping. Known for being spoiled and meddling in state affairs, she was an adversary of Princess Taiping.

description.zh-cn: 武则天的外甥，因行为不检，逼奸太平公主的随行宫女，后被流放并于途中处死。
description.en: Wu Zetian's nephew. Due to his misconduct, including assaulting a lady-in-waiting accompanying Princess Taiping, he was exiled and subsequently executed.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝官员，与太平公主有私交。
description.en: An official of the Tang dynasty who had an intimate relationship with Princess Taiping.

description.zh-cn: 武则天的男宠之一，由太平公主进献。
description.en: One of Wu Zetian's male favorites, introduced to her by Princess Taiping.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗李世民与长孙皇后之女，唐高宗的同母妹妹，薛绍的母亲。
description.en: Daughter of Emperor Taizong and Empress Zhangsun, full sister of Emperor Gaozong, and mother of Xue Shao.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝的首都。
description.en: The capital of the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 太平公主是唐高宗李治的女儿。
description.en: Princess Taiping was the daughter of Emperor Gaozong of Tang (Li Zhi).

description.zh-cn: 太平公主是武则天的女儿。
description.en: Princess Taiping was the daughter of Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 太平公主是唐中宗李显的妹妹。
description.en: Princess Taiping was the younger sister of Emperor Zhongzong of Tang (Li Xian).

description.zh-cn: 太平公主是唐睿宗李旦的妹妹。
description.en: Princess Taiping was the younger sister of Emperor Ruizong of Tang (Li Dan).

description.zh-cn: 太平公主是安定思公主的妹妹。
description.en: Princess Taiping was the younger sister of Princess Andingsi.

description.zh-cn: 太平公主是李弘的妹妹。
description.en: Princess Taiping was the younger sister of Li Hong.

description.zh-cn: 太平公主是李贤的妹妹。
description.en: Princess Taiping was the younger sister of Li Xian.

description.zh-cn: 太平公主于681年下嫁薛绍，此段婚姻因688年薛绍被赐死而结束。
description.en: Princess Taiping married Xue Shao in 681. The marriage ended with Xue Shao's forced death in 688.

description.zh-cn: 太平公主于690年改嫁武攸暨，此段婚姻因712年武攸暨去世而结束。
description.en: Princess Taiping remarried to Wu Youji in 690. The marriage ended with Wu Youji's death in 712.

description.zh-cn: 薛崇简是太平公主的儿子。
description.en: Xue Chongjian was the son of Princess Taiping.

description.zh-cn: 薛崇简是薛绍的儿子。
description.en: Xue Chongjian was the son of Xue Shao.

description.zh-cn: 薛绍是城阳公主的儿子。
description.en: Xue Shao was the son of Princess Chengyang.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗李隆基先发制人，发动了先天政变，以清除太平公主的势力。
description.en: Emperor Xuanzong (Li Longji) launched a preemptive strike, the Xiantian Coup, to eliminate Princess Taiping's power.

description.zh-cn: 在先天政变中，太平公主的党羽被诛杀，其本人最终被赐死家中。
description.en: During the Xiantian Coup, Princess Taiping's faction was eliminated, and she was ultimately forced to commit suicide at home.

description.zh-cn: 唐睿宗复位后，太平公主与太子李隆基（后来的唐玄宗）发生权力斗争，关系不合，她曾要求废掉太子并企图毒杀他。
description.en: After Emperor Ruizong's restoration, Princess Taiping engaged in a power struggle with Crown Prince Li Longji (later Emperor Xuanzong). Their relationship was hostile; she demanded his removal as crown prince and attempted to poison him.

description.zh-cn: 太平公主派人参与了由李隆基发起的唐隆政变，诛杀韦皇后，拥立其兄唐睿宗复位。
description.en: Princess Taiping dispatched her men to participate in the Tanglong Coup initiated by Li Longji, which led to the execution of Empress Wei and the restoration of her brother Emperor Ruizong.

description.zh-cn: 李隆基（后来的唐玄宗）与太平公主联手发动唐隆政变，诛杀韦皇后，拥立其父唐睿宗复位。
description.en: Li Longji (later Emperor Xuanzong) collaborated with Princess Taiping to launch the Tanglong Coup, executing Empress Wei and enthroning his father, Emperor Ruizong.

description.zh-cn: 在唐隆政变中，韦皇后及其党羽被诛杀。
description.en: During the Tanglong Coup, Empress Wei and her faction were executed.

description.zh-cn: 唐隆政变成功后，相王李旦（唐睿宗）被拥立复位。
description.en: After the success of the Tanglong Coup, Li Dan, the Prince of Xiang (Emperor Ruizong), was restored to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 太平公主因参与诛杀张昌宗、张易之兄弟而在神龙政变中有功。
description.en: Princess Taiping was credited for her role in the Shenlong Coup due to her participation in the execution of the Zhang brothers (Zhang Changzong and Zhang Yizhi).

description.zh-cn: 因薛绍的兄长薛𫖮参与李冲谋反，武则天下令将薛绍杖责一百，饿死狱中。
description.en: Because Xue Shao's brother, Xue Yi, participated in Li Chong's rebellion, Wu Zetian ordered Xue Shao to be caned one hundred times and starved to death in prison.

description.zh-cn: 安乐公主曾试图诬陷太平公主，两人敌对关系明显白热化。
description.en: Princess Anle once attempted to frame Princess Taiping, and their adversarial relationship became overtly intense.

description.zh-cn: 太平公主与上官婉儿一同草拟中宗遗诏，在上官婉儿被杀后，太平公主十分哀伤，并出资厚葬及搜集其文集。
description.en: Princess Taiping and Shangguan Wan'er jointly drafted Emperor Zhongzong's final edict. After Shangguan Wan'er's execution, Princess Taiping was deeply saddened, funded her grand burial, and collected her literary works.

description.zh-cn: 薛崇简是李隆基（后来的唐玄宗）的党羽，在太平公主倒台后仅被流放而得以幸免。
description.en: Xue Chongjian was a partisan of Li Longji (later Emperor Xuanzong) and was spared execution, only being exiled after Princess Taiping's downfall.

description.zh-cn: 贺兰敏之在太平公主年幼时曾逼奸其随行宫女（一说为太平公主本人），此事是导致其被处死的原因之一。
description.en: When Princess Taiping was young, Helan Minzhi assaulted her lady-in-waiting (some sources say it was the princess herself), which was one of the reasons leading to his execution.

description.zh-cn: 因贺兰敏之逼奸太平公主的宫女等劣迹，武则天大怒，下令将其流放并于途中处死。
description.en: Enraged by Helan Minzhi's misdeeds, including the assault on Princess Taiping's lady-in-waiting, Wu Zetian ordered him to be exiled and executed en route.

description.zh-cn: 史书记载太平公主与崔湜有私交。
description.en: Historical records indicate that Princess Taiping had an intimate relationship with Cui Shi.

description.zh-cn: 太平公主将张昌宗进献给母亲武则天，使其成为权倾一时的男宠。
description.en: Princess Taiping introduced Zhang Changzong to her mother Wu Zetian, enabling him to become a powerful male favorite.
